programme.title: Black Rock
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Katie Aselton, Kate Bosworth and Lake Bell. Three women reunite on an island they visited as childhood friends. But a meeting with another old acquaintance turns sour and they are forced to fight for their lives(n)

programme.title: Vivre Sa Vie
programme.desc: Nana leaves her husband and infant son hoping to find fame as an actress, but when she runs out of money her dream of becoming a film star collapses and she drifts into prostitution. Jean-Luc Godard's drama, starring Anna Karina. In French(n)

programme.title: Catch That Kid
programme.desc: A plucky teenager racks her brains to think of a way of financing an operation for her father who was injured in a mountaineering accident, and eventually comes up with a daring plan to rob a bank with the help of friends. Comedy adventure, starring Kristen Stewart, Corbin Bleu, Max Thieriot and Jennifer Beals(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird Interview Special
programme.desc: Greta Gerwig and Saoirse Ronan talk about making their beautifully observed coming-of-age story(n)

programme.title: Dr Seuss' The Lorax
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure with the voices of Zac Efron, Ed Helms and Danny DeVito. In a city where everything is artificial, young Ted Wiggins seeks to win the heart of his dream girl Audrey by finding her a real tree. But first he must reverse the destructive work of a greedy businessman with the aid of a grumpy woodland guardian(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: Comedy based on the books by Jeff Kinney, starring Zachary Gordon. When 11-year-old Greg Heffley steps up the next rung in the educational ladder he discovers his new middle school is full of people determined to either humiliate him or cause him physical pain. If he's going to get out in one piece, Greg needs a plan(n)

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: Disaster thriller starring Tommy Lee Jones and Anne Heche. When an underground explosion kills several construction workers who are building a tunnel in Los Angeles, a team of seismologists investigates and discovers that volcanic activity is threatening to destroy the city(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Will Smith. Chicago, 2035: in a society that has become almost entirely dependent on robots, Detective Del Spooner is called upon to investigate the death of eminent scientist Dr Alfred Lanning. All the evidence points to Lanning's superadvanced robot prototype being responsible, but everybody knows that robots are programmed never to harm a human..(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird Interview Special
programme.desc: Greta Gerwig and Saoirse Ronan talk about making their beautifully observed coming-of-age story(n)

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: Comedy starring Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann and Kate Upton. When the wife of philanderer Mark King meets his mistress, it promises to be explosive. But the two woman discover there is more to this love triangle than meets the eye and Mark soon learns that hell hath no fury..(n)

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: Horror starring Jeff Goldblum and Geena Davis. Seth Brundle, a scientist obsessed with perfecting a revolutionary teleportation machine, meets and falls in love with journalist Veronica Quaife. As he battles to repeat his success with inanimate objects by teleporting live animals, Seth decides in a moment of recklessness to test the device on himself - but with horrific results(n)

programme.title: Young Detective Dee: Rise of the Sea Dragon
programme.desc: The Tang dynasty's naval fleet has been devastated by a sea monster and it is not long before a young Dee Renjie is investigating the case. He also attempts to prevent the sacrifice of the beautiful courtesan Yin Ruiki. Mystery adventure prequel, starring Mark Chao, Carina Lau and Feng Shaofeng. In Mandarin(n)

programme.title: The Great St Trinian's Train Robbery
programme.desc: Comedy starring Frankie Howerd as the leader of a gang of train robbers who are attempting to recover their loot from an empty mansion. Unfortunately for them, the building has been used to re-house the unruly schoolgirls of St Trinian's(n)

programme.title: Room Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Lenny Abrahamson and star Brie Larson talk about making the powerful screen adaptation of Emma Donoghue's best-selling novel(n)

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Mystery adventure starring Nicholas Rowe and Alan Cox. 1870: bumbling John Watson arrives at his new school and is immediately drawn to the imposing intellect of fellow student Sherlock Holmes. A schoolmaster's strange death leads the pair to their first criminal investigation, beginning a frightening adventure that carries them to the Pyramid of Fear(n)

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
programme.desc: Darkly gothic Hammer version of the classic Sherlock Holmes mystery, starring Peter Cushing, Christopher Lee and André Morell. For 200 years the Baskerville lords have died horribly - ripped to death by a ghostly hound on mist-shrouded Dartmoor. Sir Henry Baskerville is the last of the line and his friend Dr Mortimer believes there is only one man who can save him from the 'Baskerville Curse' - the world's greatest detective, Sherlock Holmes(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Sci-fi action comedy starring David Duchovny and Julianne Moore. When scientists Ira Kane and Harry Block find a crashed meteorite in the Arizona desert, they are able to extract a slimy blue fluid from it. But the bizarre substance contains alien organisms that are capable of evolving at an unprecedented rate, and this has consequences for the survival of Earth itself(n)

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy starring Queen Latifah. A New Orleans saleswoman is diagnosed with a fatal illness and starts making up for lost time by withdrawing all her savings and indulging in a taste of the high life before she goes. Checking into a glamorous Czech hotel, she soon has the other guests wondering who this wealthy yet down-to-earth woman can be(n)

programme.title: 13 Hours: the Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: A US embassy in Libya comes under attack from extremists, who kill the ambassador. With no help in sight, a small band of CIA security operatives from various military backgrounds takes a stand to fight off the attackers and protect the remaining diplomatic personnel. Fact-based action thriller, starring John Krasinski and James Badge Dale(n)

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller starring Bradley Cooper and Robert De Niro. One of life's losers is transformed into a high-achieving dynamo thanks to a mysterious new drug, but his overnight success attracts the wrong kind of attention from those keen to profit from the discovery(n)

programme.title: Enough Said
programme.desc: A masseuse anxious about her daughter leaving home finds romance with a man also coming to terms with an empty nest. She later befriends a bitter divorced client, who turns out to be her new partner's ex-wife. Romantic comedy drama, with James Gandolfini, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Catherine Keener and Toni Collette(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: In this arts documentary, Nadia Nadarajah explores the influence of BSL poet Dot Miles and the significance of her poetry(n)

programme.title: Appointment with Danger
programme.desc: A nun is targeted by murderers when they realise she is the only witness to one of their crimes. Vintage thriller, starring Phyllis Calvert, Alan Ladd and Paul Stewart(n)

programme.title: Yangtse Incident
programme.desc: War drama based on a true story, starring Richard Todd. In 1949, a British warship fights for survival after it is attacked by Chinese communists on the Yangtse River(n)

programme.title: Posse from Hell
programme.desc: Western starring Audie Murphy and John Saxon. Four convicted killers break out of jail and ride into the frontier town of Paradise. A few hours later, the bank is looted, three men lie dead and the gang have escaped with a young woman hostage. Ex-gunfighter Banner Cole is asked to form a posse, but volunteers are scarce and only six men set off to bring the murderers to justice(n)

programme.title: The Miracle of Morgan's Creek
programme.desc: Classic comedy starring Eddie Bracken and Betty Hutton. Trudy cannot resist a man in uniform. After a particularly wild night she awakes to discover herself apparently married to a soldier whose name she cannot remember. To makes matters worse, he has vanished and she's now expecting his baby(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird Interview Special
programme.desc: Greta Gerwig and Saoirse Ronan talk about making their beautifully observed coming-of-age story(n)

programme.title: Belle
programme.desc: Period drama starring Gugu Mbatha-Raw. The true story of Dido Elizabeth Belle, the illegitimate mixed-race daughter of a British serviceman who is raised by her aristocrat British uncle. But will the colour of Belle's skin prevent her from ever being fully accepted?(n)

programme.title: Room Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Lenny Abrahamson and star Brie Larson talk about making the powerful screen adaptation of Emma Donoghue's best-selling novel(n)

programme.title: The Day after Tomorrow
programme.desc: Disaster movie from Independence Day director Roland Emmerich, starring Dennis Quaid and Jake Gyllenhaal. When climatologist Jack Hall tries to warn Washington that the planet is facing an imminent, catastrophic climate shift, government officials fail to take him seriously. But, when the Earth abruptly plunges into a new ice age, it soon becomes clear that the human race is facing extinction(n)

programme.title: Fruitvale Station
programme.desc: Premiere. Fact-based drama following the last day in the life of Oscar Grant, a young man who was shot dead while being restrained by police officers on New Year's Day 2009. Oscar spends New Year's Eve trying to make a fresh start, and improve his relationships with his mother, girlfriend and four-year-old daughter. Starring Michael B Jordan, Melonie Diaz and Octavia Spencer(n)

programme.title: Bound
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Jennifer Tilly and Gina Gershon. Ex-con Corky is renovating a luxury apartment when she encounters the seductive Violet. Together they hatch a plot to steal a consignment of Mob money from Violet's gangster boyfriend - a scheme that is destined to go violently awry(n)

programme.title: Destry
programme.desc: Western starring Audie Murphy. An unarmed lawman's attempts to bring order to a chaotic town attract the attention of the local saloon's high-spirited singer(n)

programme.title: All That Heaven Allows
programme.desc: Melodrama starring Jane Wyman and Rock Hudson. Wealthy widow Cary Scott, after years of shunning company, falls in love with gardener Ron Kirby, who is 15 years her junior. The difference in social status as well as their age shocks her family and friends, and soon their relationship is affected by gossip(n)

programme.title: The Tin Star
programme.desc: A world-weary bounty hunter, formerly a sheriff, arrives in a small town where a newly-appointed lawman is struggling to keep the peace. When he learns of the mercenary's past, the inexperienced lawman seeks his help in learning the tricks of the trade so he can bring an outlaw gang to justice. Anthony Mann's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Anthony Perkins, Lee Van Cleef, Betsy Palmer and Michel Ray(n)

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: Classic disaster movie starring Gene Hackman and Ernest Borgnine. Passengers aboard the luxury liner Poseidon are celebrating New Year's Eve in style, when suddenly the world turns upside down - the ship has been hit by a tidal wave. Can anyone escape the floating death trap before it sinks?(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: Action adventure sequel starring Bruce Willis and Dwayne Johnson. The GI Joe team's fight against evil organisation Cobra becomes a fight for survival when they are framed by Cobra leader Zartan, who is now posing as the President of the United States(n)

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: Drama adapted from Emma Donoghue's novel, starring Oscar-winning Brie Larson. The mother of five-year-old Jack strives to make her son's life as normal as possible. But it's a difficult task given they are incarcerated in a claustrophobic space, the only world Jack has known since birth(n)

programme.title: Sorcerer
programme.desc: Four men with shady pasts take a lucrative and potentially fatal delivery job driving two trucks full of dangerously unstable dynamite along equally unsound roads through the South American jungle. William Friedkin's thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Bruno Cremer, Francisco Rabal and Amidou(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Action comedy thriller starring Martin Lawrence and Will Smith as motormouth Miami cops Burnett and Lowrey, who are assigned to bring down a drugs lord and stop the flow of ecstasy into the city. But the operation and the officers' friendship are compromised by Lowrey's relationship with a female agent - who also happens to be Burnett's sister. \n

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Oscar-winning sports drama written by and starring Sylvester Stallone. Rocky Balboa is a down-on-his-luck boxer scraping a living collecting debts for a Philadelphia loan shark. But when heavyweight champion Apollo Creed puts his title up for grabs in a US Bicentennial publicity stunt, Balboa receives an unexpected shot at the big time

programme.title: Hell Is for Heroes
programme.desc: Wartime adventure starring Steve McQueen. In the latter days of the Second World War, a small squadron of GIs is assigned to hold a large area of land near the Siegfried Line against overwhelming odds

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Action spy thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Emmanuelle Béart. The elite Impossible Mission Force's latest assignment is to recover stolen information that threatens to blow the cover of US spies throughout the world. But the plan goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of former colleague-gone-bad Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Michelle Monaghan. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is retired from active duty and trying to live a quiet life with his new fiancée, Julia. When an operative he personally trained is kidnapped while investigating ruthless arms dealer Owen Davian, Hunt agrees to help rescue her, but the mission goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Rogue One
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2018
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen(c)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Action spy thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Emmanuelle Béart. The elite Impossible Mission Force's latest assignment is to recover stolen information that threatens to blow the cover of US spies throughout the world. But the plan goes disastrously wrong

Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
programme.desc: Martial arts action thriller starring Jet Li and Bridget Fonda. Life becomes hazardous for top Chinese cop Liu Jiuan when he is sent to Paris to help the local vice squad bring a drug baron to justice

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Thriller starring Wesley Snipes and Gary Busey. US Marshal Pete Nessip's brother is killed during a daring midair attempt to free a villain who is being escorted to a federal prison on board a 747. Convinced that those involved in the operation must be planning a major robbery, Pete joins a group of maverick skydivers and risks all as he attempts to track down the ruthless gang responsible for his brother's murder

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Boxing drama written, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. Rocky Balboa became famous after going the distance with world heavyweight champion Apollo Creed. But with no job and no future, his only chance is to bow to Creed's taunts and re-enter the ring for a return fight, even though it could cost him his sight

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back to Africa and into a trap. Adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Margot Robbie and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Desert Rats
programme.desc: Second World War action drama starring Richard Burton and Robert Newton. Tobruk, 1941: tough British army officer Captain MacRoberts is assigned to an Australian division under siege from Field Marshal Rommel's forces in the North African desert. Among MacRoberts's troops is his former schoolteacher, now an alcoholic

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Futuristic action thriller starring Jason Statham and Joan Allen. After being wrongly jailed for his wife's murder, a former racing driver is offered the chance to win back his freedom by taking part in the latest reality-TV craze - a motor race so violent it results in the deaths of most competitors. \n\n

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back to Africa and into a trap. Adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Margot Robbie and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer
programme.desc: A drug-addled assassin goes rogue, opting to protect rather than take out his latest target. Action thriller, starring Sam Worthington, Odeya Rush and Allen Leech

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Action crime thriller based on the popular video game, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko. When elite assassin Agent 47 is betrayed following a mission to kill the Russian president, he goes on the run, pursued by his former colleagues, the Russian military and an Interpol agent

programme.title: Batman and Robin
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and George Clooney. Called to the Gotham City Museum of Art where Mr Freeze and his gang are in the process of stealing a huge diamond, Batman and Robin are thwarted in their attempts to stop the heist when the Boy Wonder is frozen by the villains

programme.title: The 13th Warrior
programme.desc: Period action adventure based on Michael Crichton's novel Eaters of the Dead, starring Antonio Banderas. A cultured Muslim emissary joins forces with an uncouth band of Vikings when bloodthirsty invaders who will eat anything in their path threaten the Vikings' homeland

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Wartime action drama starring Owen Wilson and Gene Hackman. During a reconnaissance mission over Bosnia, US serviceman Chris Burnett is shot down after photographing evidence of activity in a demilitarised zone. Abandoned by Nato peacekeepers, who believe a rescue mission would threaten the fragile ceasefire, Burnett's only hope is a determined commanding officer who refuses to desert a comrade

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Action adventure based on the popular 1980s TV series, starring Liam Neeson and Bradley Cooper. Four American soldiers serving in Iraq are wrongly convicted and sent to prison following the death of a senior officer during a secret operation. While incarcerated they receive information that they were framed, so decide to escape and begin an effort to clear their names

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Bill Paxton, Helen Hunt and Cary Elwes. When one of the planet's most deadly natural phenomena blows into town, a feuding team of professional tornado-chasing meteorologists tracks the trail of destruction

programme.title: The 13th Warrior
programme.desc: Period action adventure based on Michael Crichton's novel Eaters of the Dead, starring Antonio Banderas. A cultured Muslim emissary joins forces with an uncouth band of Vikings when bloodthirsty invaders who will eat anything in their path threaten the Vikings' homeland

Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Action drama starring Sylvester Stallone. Vietnam veteran John Rambo is enjoying a quiet existence in Thailand until he is hired to rescue a group of Christian missionaries who have been kidnapped by a brutal local infantry unit in war-torn Burma

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Wartime action drama starring Owen Wilson and Gene Hackman. Abandoned by Nato peacekeepers, who believe a rescue mission would threaten the fragile ceasefire, Burnett's only hope is a determined commanding officer who refuses to desert a comrade

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy and Morgan Freeman. Following the death of his father, put-upon accountant Wesley Gibson discovers that the man had a secret identity as a super-skilled assassin. After an attempt on his life is thwarted by the sultry Fox, Wesley is taken to the headquarters of an elite group of killers where he's told he has inherited his father's skills and must unleash them to protect himself

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Boxing drama written, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. Rocky Balboa became famous after going the distance with world heavyweight champion Apollo Creed. But with no job and no future, his only chance is to bow to Creed's taunts and re-enter the ring for a return fight, even though it could cost him his sight

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: Boxing drama written, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. Three years after winning the world championship and having successfully defended his title ten times, Rocky Balboa appears to have everything in life including a beautiful wife and a young son. Then fearsome new challenger Clubber Lang appears on the scene - a boxer so ruthless that Rocky is advised to retire rather than meet him in the ring

Disaster movie starring John Cusack, Amanda Peet and Chiwetel Ejiofor. As predicted by the Mayan calendar, the world is coming to an end in a series of extreme weather events and earthquakes as a result of damage to the Earth's core. A failed writer tries to save his family from annihilation after learning of a top secret project to evacuate a favoured few to secret shelters

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Sports drama starring Tom Cruise, Robert Duvall and Nicole Kidman. Cocky racing driver Cole Trickle is revved up to take the stock-car circuit by storm, but his aggressive driving style soon lands him in hospital. There he meets Dr Claire Lewicki, who gives the young driver more than racing to think about

Historical action adventure starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey and David Wenham. When the fiercely ambitious King Xerxes of Persia plans to invade Greece, King Leonidas mobilises his personal bodyguard of 300 Spartan warriors to defend the pass at Thermopylae

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Classic Second World War adventure based on a true story, starring Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough and Charles Bronson. In an attempt to contain rebellious PoWs, the Nazis transfer the leading troublemakers to a seemingly escape-proof security camp. However, with the finest escape team in military history now under one roof, the German guards are hard pressed to prevent the Allied prisoners from breaking out

As predicted by the Mayan calendar, the world is coming to an end in a series of extreme weather events and earthquakes as a result of damage to the Earth's core. A failed writer tries to save his family from annihilation after learning of a top secret project to evacuate a favoured few to secret shelters

programme.title: Little Man
programme.desc: Comedy starring Marlon and Shawn Wayans. Pursued by police following a diamond robbery, diminutive criminal Calvin Simms hides the stolen gem on an unsuspecting couple. Unfortunately for him, the only way to get into the couple's house and retrieve the booty is to masquerade as an abandoned baby

programme.title: Brüno
programme.desc: Spoof documentary starring Sacha Baron Cohen. An outrageous gay fashion journalist decides to re-launch his career in Los Angeles after disgracing himself in his native Austria. But are the people across the pond ready for his alternative attitude to life?

programme.title: Jackass 3.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his death-defying team of pranksters embark on even more strange and disturbing stunts in this compilation of material filmed for the third movie in the comedy series. Gags featured include misuse of a defibrillator machine and provoking an alligator

programme.title: Police Academy 6: City under Siege
programme.desc: Comedy in the long-running Police Academy series. The bungling cops attempt to bring LA's Wilson Heights gang to justice. But every time they're ready to pounce, the criminals make another getaway

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jim Carrey and Téa Leoni as successful suburban couple Dick and Jane Harper. When Dick loses his job after being made the scapegoat for financial irregularities within his firm, he and his wife realise that the only way to retain their affluent lifestyle is to turn to crime.\n

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Sports comedy starring Rob Schneider, David Spade and Jon Heder. Three young men who were bullied at school because of their lack of sporting ability decide to strike a blow for clumsy kids everywhere by entering a baseball tournament set up by an eccentric billionaire

programme.title: Any Which Way You Can
programme.desc: Action comedy sequel to Every Which Way but Loose, starring Clint Eastwood and Sondra Locke. Clyde is back! The wily orangutan and his friend, bare-knuckle fighter Philo Beddoe, find themselves up against motorcycle gangs, ruthless mobsters, crazed gamblers and the roughest, toughest fighter in America

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: Supernatural romantic comedy starring Ricky Gervais, Greg Kinnear and Téa Leoni. When misanthropic Manhattan dentist Bertram Pincus wakes up after briefly dying during a routine operation, he soon realises he has the ability to see dead people. Unfortunately, the ghosts all want something from him, particularly Frank Herlihy who beseeches Pincus to break up the impending marriage of his widow, Gwen

programme.title: Dodgeball: a True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Sports comedy starring Vince Vaughn and Ben Stiller. Peter La Fleur is the owner of Average Joe's, a run-down gym that's short of cash and in danger of being taken over by hi-tech rivals Globo Gym. In desperation, La Fleur and his misfit friends form a dodgeball team in a bid to reach a tournament in Las Vegas, where the grand prize stands at a cool $50,000

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler. When his latest girlfriend dumps him because she says he is not a responsible adult, 32-year-old Sonny Koufax tries to win her back by adopting the illegitimate five-year-old son of his friend Kevin, who's on a trip to China

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: The heroic outlaw returns from the Crusades to discover the country is in the grip of evil Prince John and the Sheriff of Rottingham, so he unites a motley band of warriors to overthrow them. Mel Brooks comedy, starring Cary Elwes, Roger Rees, Richard Lewis, Tracey Ullman, Amy Yasbeck, Patrick Stewart, Isaac Hayes and Dom DeLuise

programme.title: Dodgeball: a True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Sports comedy starring Vince Vaughn and Ben Stiller. Peter La Fleur is the owner of Average Joe's, a run-down gym that's short of cash and in danger of being taken over by hi-tech rivals Globo Gym. In desperation, La Fleur and his misfit friends form a dodgeball team in a bid to reach a tournament in Las Vegas, where the grand prize stands at a cool $50,000

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan

programme.title: 48 HRS
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Nick Nolte and Eddie Murphy. With vicious escaped convict Albert Ganz loose in San Francisco, bullish cop Jack Cates needs all the help he can get to track him down. Unfortunately, that 'help' comes in the form of smart-mouthed young prisoner Reggie Hammond, who has his own reasons for stopping Ganz's rampage, and only a 48-hour release from jail in which to do it if he and Cates don't kill each other first!

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: Comedy starring John Belushi and Tim Matheson. Faber College, 1962: the students of Delta House have a reputation for wild parties and drinking. However, as the latest batch of freshmen arrives on campus, the future of the house comes under threat from the dean, who has decided that such unbridled behaviour is not to be tolerated

programme.title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
programme.desc: The Python team examines the trials and tribulations of human life in their usual irreverent comic style. Written by and starring Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones and Michael Palin

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Comedy, the seventh film in the Police Academy series, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf and featuring Christopher Lee. The Police Academy team travel to Moscow, having been called in to help apprehend a Russian crime boss who is attempting to take over the world with a computer game

programme.title: Dude, Where's My Car?
programme.desc: Goofball comedy starring Ashton Kutcher, Seann William Scott and Kristy Swanson. Dedicated party animals Jesse and Chester wake after a night of particularly heavy indulgence and can't remember where they left the car that contains presents for their girlfriends. If that wasn't enough of a problem, they find themselves pursued by aliens who want to get hold of an important instrument required for saving the universe, which the boys have somehow mislaid

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: Wartime comedy based on the BBC TV sitcom, starring Toby Jones, Bill Nighy and Catherine Zeta-Jones. England, 1944: when a glamorous reporter is sent to profile the Home Guard of Walmington-on-Sea, it's not long before romance rears its head. Meanwhile, MI5 has reason to believe a German spy is operating in the town..

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: American football comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kathy Bates. When a simple man is fired from his job as a waterboy for the local college team, he manages to secure a new post with a college that has lost 40 matches in a row

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Comedy starring Tina Fey and Steve Carell. Married couple Phil and Claire Foster plan a visit to a swanky Manhattan restaurant, but on arrival discover it is fully booked. In a desperate effort to get a table they claim to be the Tripplehorns, a couple who haven't taken up their reservation. But the no-show diners have some shady acquaintances and Phil and Claire's little deception leads to a night of mayhem

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow and Jack Black. A determination to follow his father's advice and date only beautiful women has not proved much of a success for Hal Larson. But a chance encounter with self-help guru Tony Robbins leaves Hal blessed with the ability to see only inner beauty, and it's not long before he is smitten with the larger-than-life Rosemary

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels. When limousine driver Lloyd Christmas gets the sack, he persuades his roommate Harry Dunne to drive him to Aspen in pursuit of an attractive woman passenger who left a briefcase behind. The daft duo embark on a variety of adventures before discovering the briefcase is full of dollar bills

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys D'Movie
programme.desc: Comedy spin-off from the BBC sitcom, starring Brendan O'Carroll. As Irish matriarch Mrs Brown endeavours to save Dublin's Moore Street Market from being swallowed up in a corporate property deal, she's also hit with a huge tax bill. Meanwhile a dark secret is revealed about her early days as a hard-up 'mammy'

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Comedy starring Lindsay Lohan. A teenager who has been educated at home in Africa by her anthropologist parents is sent to an American high school for the first time, where she soon learns about the 'survival of the fittest'.\n

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Comedy starring Tina Fey and Steve Carell. Married couple Phil and Claire Foster plan a visit to a swanky Manhattan restaurant, but on arrival discover it is fully booked. In a desperate effort to get a table they claim to be the Tripplehorns, a couple who haven't taken up their reservation. But the no-show diners have some shady acquaintances and Phil and Claire's little deception leads to a night of mayhem

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow and Jack Black. A determination to follow his father's advice and date only beautiful women has not proved much of a success for Hal Larson. But a chance encounter with self-help guru Tony Robbins leaves Hal blessed with the ability to see only inner beauty, and it's not long before he is smitten with the larger-than-life Rosemary

programme.title: Another 48 HRS
programme.desc: Comedy thriller starring Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte. After seven long years, Reggie Hammond is still behind bars and Jack Cates remains a rogue cop. Each has bad debts and old scores to settle. Hammond's release and Cates's suspension coincide, but the two can't catch up on old times, even if they wanted to, with a murderous biker gang gunning for them and someone wanting them dead within 48 hours

programme.title: Talladega Nights: the Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Comedy starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen. Nascar racing champion Ricky Bobby has all the trappings of a successful career: a glamorous wife, a luxury home and a fanatical fanbase. But when French driver Jean Girard threatens Ricky's dominance, he seems ill-equipped to meet the challenge

programme.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
programme.desc: Cult musical satire starring Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon and Barry Bostwick. Sweethearts Brad Majors and Janet Weiss find themselves drawn into a bizarre and weird world when their car breaks down during a storm and they are forced to spend the night at a nearby gothic mansion

programme.title: License to Drive
programme.desc: Comedy starring Corey Haim and Corey Feldman. Despite having just failed his driving test, Les is determined to take the girl of his dreams out on a date. But after he borrows his grandfather's beloved classic car without his knowledge, the evening turns into a disaster

programme.title: The Night Is Young
programme.desc: On a booze-fuelled night out, two pairs of downtrodden friends discover that Los Angeles might not be as bad they'd always assumed. Comedy, starring Matt Jones, Dave Hill and Kelen Coleman

programme.title: The Tiger Hunter
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Danny Pudi. A young Indian man unsuccessfully following the American Dream comes up with an elaborate charade to woo his childhood sweetheart

programme.title: Kill Me Three Times
programme.desc: A hitman arrives in an Australian surfing town on a mission. However, he soon discovers he is not the only one plotting to kill his intended target, and gets mixed up in his rivals' stories of murder, blackmail and revenge. Comedy thriller, starring Simon Pegg, Alice Braga, Luke Hemsworth and Bryan Brown

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Two college graduates faced with the prospect of deciding what to do with their lives find themselves faced with a more immediate crisis - getting and keeping a job. Their search for employment takes them through a succession of strange experiences and even stranger workplaces. Comedy, starring Miles Teller, Anna Kendrick, Bryan Cranston and Alison Brie

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Comedy fantasy starring Bill Murray and Andie MacDowell. Cynical TV weatherman Phil Connors is sent to cover the annual Groundhog Day festival at a small town in Pennsylvania. Stranded by a snowstorm, which he failed to predict, Phil wakes up the following morning to discover that it's still the day before, and it slowly dawns on the world-weary forecaster that he'll never have to worry about tomorrow

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: Comedy starring John Candy and Macaulay Culkin. Buck Russell is a fun-loving bachelor without a care in the world. He's also the world's greatest slob. So when he has to look after his sharp young nephew and nieces while their parents are away, anything can - and will - happen

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Goofy comedy starring Adam Sandler. When his father announces that he's relinquishing control of the family's hotel chain, spoilt rich kid Billy Madison faces an ultimatum - repeat his twelve school grades successfully in six months, or lose the business

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Comedy fantasy starring Bill Murray and Andie MacDowell. Cynical TV weatherman Phil Connors is sent to cover the annual Groundhog Day festival at a small town in Pennsylvania. Stranded by a snowstorm, which he failed to predict, Phil wakes up the following morning to discover that it's still the day before, and it slowly dawns on the world-weary forecaster that he'll never have to worry about tomorrow

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: Comedy starring Steve Guttenberg. The new mayor of an American city decides to change the rules to allow anyone to join the police force. The decision proves to be a recipe for unadulterated chaos

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rob Schneider as fish-tank cleaner Deuce Bigalow who takes a job house-sitting for a gigolo. But when Deuce wrecks the place accidentally, he is forced to raise the money for repairs by taking up his paymaster's profession and servicing some of his more unusual clients.\n

programme.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Jack Black and Kyle Gass as JB and KG, two guitarists determined to be the greatest rockers in the world. All they need to succeed is 'The Pick of Destiny', a guitar pick with supernatural powers made from Satan's tooth. But Satan isn't too keen on the idea

programme.title: Easy Come, Easy Go
programme.desc: Musical adventure starring Elvis Presley. Navy diver Ted Jackson discovers gold on a Spanish wreck and sets out to retrieve it with the help of Jo Symington - a go-go dancing yoga student - and her seadog father

programme.title: The Banger Sisters
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Susan Sarandon and Goldie Hawn. Once the wildest groupies on the Californian rock 'n' roll scene, best friends Lavinia and Suzette have not seen each other in over 20 years. But when Suzette is fired from her bar job she heads to suburbia in search of her former 'banger sister' - and is shocked to find that Lavinia is now a highly conservative wife and mother

programme.title: Adult Beginners
programme.desc: An entrepreneur on the brink of success instead loses everything when the product he launches is a failure, prompting his friends to turn their backs on him. He retreats to the safety of his sister's home, where he is allowed to stay on the condition he helps look after her three-year-old son. Despite his haphazard attitude to childcare, he forms a close relationship with his nephew. Comedy drama, starring Nick Kroll, Rose Byrne and Bobby Cannavale

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Barbershop: a Fresh Cut
programme.desc: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much-needed change to their neighbourhood. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Cedric the Entertainer and Regina Hall

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jim Carrey and Renée Zellweger. Good-natured Charlie Baileygates just loves to help people. But years of being used take their toll when Charlie develops a vicious alter ego called Hank - a difficult situation that becomes even more complicated when 'both' men fall in love with the same woman

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: Spoof documentary hosted by Marty DiBergi that follows the exciting comeback tour of Britain's most punctual heavy rockers, Spinal Tap, as they launch their provocative new album Smell the Glove before literally dozens of indifferent fans

programme.title: Loser
programme.desc: Comedy romance starring Jason Biggs and Mena Suvari. Country boy Paul Tannek is the first member of his family to make it to college, but he receives a less than cordial welcome from his spoilt rich-kid roommates. Although he eventualy finds a friend in fellow student Dora, unfortunately she has problems of her own

programme.title: Airplane!
programme.desc: Disaster-movie spoof starring Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty and Leslie Nielsen. An eccentric collection of passengers and crew sets off from Los Angeles on a flight bound for Chicago. However, disaster looms when the pilots are struck down with food poisoning and former fighter pilot Ted Striker, trying to win back the love of stewardess Elaine, must face his fear of flying to land the plane

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost. On their much anticipated road trip to America's notorious Area 51, two sci-fi geeks find themselves in the company of a real-life extraterrestrial who needs their help

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: Spoof documentary hosted by Marty DiBergi that follows the exciting comeback tour of Britain's most punctual heavy rockers, Spinal Tap, as they launch their provocative new album Smell the Glove before literally dozens of indifferent fans

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: Thriller starring Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon, Neve Campbell and Denise Richards. Things look bleak for high-school counsellor Sam Lombardo when two students, spoilt rich girl Kelly Van Ryan and down at heel Suzie Toller, accuse him of serious sexual offences. But when the case comes to court, it soon becomes clear that all is not as it seems

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: An FBI agent risks everything on the trail of masked robbers hitting a series of Cincinnati banks. Crime thriller, starring Christopher Meloni, Bruce Willis and Dave Bautista

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Action crime caper starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon and Julia Roberts. Supercool crook Danny Ocean has only just been released from prison, but is already planning his next job. But as Danny begins to assemble his team for the heist, it becomes clear he has motives other than just getting rich quick. \n

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: Action crime caper sequel starring George Clooney and Brad Pitt. Three years after their original outing, Danny Ocean and his crew have been tracked down by the casino owner from whom they stole $160 million, and he is demanding his money back. Forced to perform an even bigger heist, they soon find themselves in competition with 'The Night Fox', an eccentric French thief

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Crime comedy caper sequel starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon and Al Pacino. When legendary Las Vegas entrepreneur Reuben Tishkoff is cheated out of his latest casino venture by dishonest partner Willy Bank, Tishkoff's friend Danny Ocean assembles his old crew for a spot of revenge

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Tommy Lee Jones and Wesley Snipes. Following the crash of a plane transporting prisoners, experienced US Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team are brought in to capture escaped convict Mark Sheridan. As Gerard learns more about his quarry, a straightforward manhunt becomes more dangerous than ever

programme.title: K-19: the Widowmaker
programme.desc: Action thriller based on a true story, starring Harrison Ford and Liam Neeson. The Atlantic Ocean, 1961: when Soviet nuclear submarine K-19 develops a radioactive leak off the American coast, tension escalates between the captain and his executive officer as the vessel's engineers struggle to prevent a nuclear catastrophe.\n

programme.title: The Last Castle
programme.desc: Prison thriller starring Robert Redford and James Gandolfini. Lieutenant General Eugene R Irwin disobeys an order in combat that sees eight of his men killed. He is court-martialled and sent to a maximum security military prison, where he is destined to come to blows with the vicious warden, Colonel Winter

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Curtis '50 Cent' Jackson as Marcus, a kid left to fend for himself in a rough New York neighbourhood after the death of his mother, who falls into a life of drugs and crime. However, when Marcus is left injured after being attacked in jail, he decides to change direction and follow his dream of making music, using his tough life as inspiration

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: We Still Steal the Old Way
programme.desc: After their exploits in We Still Kill the Old Way, criminal outfit the Archer Gang encounters an old enemy when a daring heist ends with them behind bars. Prison drama, starring Ian Ogilvy, Billy Murray and Lysette Anthony

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: Biographical drama, directed by and featuring Danny DeVito starring Jack Nicholson. The story of the controversial American trade union leader Jimmy Hoffa, told in flashback by his associate Bobby Ciaro

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Patricia Kalember, David Charvet and Christopher Atkins. When an emergency flight transporting a seriously ill two-year-old girl to hospital crashes in the Rocky Mountains, the five people on board face a fight for survival as a rescue team searches for them in blizzard conditions

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Crime thriller from director Spike Lee, starring Denzel Washington, Clive Owen and Jodie Foster. When police detective Keith Frazier is called in as a hostage negotiator following a siege at a Manhattan bank, he thinks he's dealing with a straightforward crime scenario. However, the criminal ringleader scuppers all police attempts to take control of the situation and events are further complicated by the appearance of shady power broker Madeleine White, whose main objective is to protect the personal interests of the bank's president rather than aiding and abetting the police operation

programme.title: United 93
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story. On 11 September 2001, four planes are hijacked by terrorists in America. Two destroy the World Trade Center in New York and a third smashes a hole in the Pentagon building in Arlington, Virginia. There are no survivors. Realising that to do nothing will mean almost certain death, passengers on board the fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, decide to fight for their lives

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Drama starring Clint Eastwood. Retired car-assembly worker, widower, Korean War veteran and all-round curmudgeon Walt Kowalski is thrown into conflict with his Hmong neighbours after one of the teenage sons tries to steal his prize 1972 Ford Gran Torino as part of a gang initiation rite

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: Prison sports comedy based on the 1974 Burt Reynolds film, starring Vinnie Jones as disgraced footballer Danny Meehan. In jail after assaulting a police officer, Meehan offers to coach a team of prisoners for a football match against the guards, but soon finds himself in conflict with the corrupt prison governor

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Crime thriller based on the 1969 British caper movie, starring Mark Wahlberg and Edward Norton. A criminal gang run by Charlie Croker (Wahlberg) and veteran thief John Bridger (Donald Sutherland) pulls off an audacious gold bullion robbery in Venice, only for colleague Steve (Edward Norton) to run off with the loot, leaving Bridger dead. Finally tracking Steve down to LA, Croker enlists the help of Bridger's safecracking daughter Stella (Charlize Theron) to get even in spectacular fashion

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: Action drama starring Liam Neeson as former CIA operative Bryan Mills, who calls upon his tried-and-tested skills in a race-against-time bid to rescue his daughter from the sex traffickers who have kidnapped her during a holiday in France

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Satirical science-fiction thriller starring Peter Weller and Nancy Allen. In futuristic Old Detroit a large conglomerate is now responsible for policing the city. When a young cop is murdered by a ruthless gang, his body is transformed into a computerised cyborg programmed to fight crime. But the human side of the 'perfect' cop is soon seeking revenge on his killers

programme.title: RoboCop 2
programme.desc: The cybernetic law enforcer returns to battle a deranged drug lord. Meanwhile, he is unaware the corporation that created him has scheduled his replacement by a more powerful version. To complete the new cyborg, they need a human brain, and a renegade scientist secretly implants the injured drug lord's brain into the robot, transforming it into an uncontrollable killing machine. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Tom Noonan and Belinda Bauer

programme.title: My Father Die
programme.desc: A deaf mute waits almost two decades to get his hands on his abusive father. Action drama, starring Joe Anderson, John Schneider and Kevin Gage

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Dead
programme.desc: Wounded amnesiac crook Brian Barnes goes on the run from a drug lord, a crooked sheriff and the DEA. Thriller, starring Johnny Messner, Danny Trejo and Dolph Lundgren

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: A family fight to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic world where disease has wiped out almost the entire population. Survival thriller, starring Carter Roy, Amy Rutberg and Sebastian Beacon

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Thriller starring Colin Farrell. When sleazy New York publicist Stu Shepard answers a call in a public phone booth moments after speaking to his mistress, he's told that if he hangs up, he'll be shot. When a would-be caller is killed, Shepard finds himself in the sights of both the police and the hidden gunman

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama starring Michael Douglas and Charlie Sheen. After becoming the protégé of ruthless wheeler-dealer Gordon Gekko, enthusiastic young broker Bud Fox breaks all the rules of business practice on his meteoric rise to the top. But then one of Gekko's proposed takeovers presents Fox with a dilemma

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: Thriller starring Tye Sheridan, Emory Cohen and Bel Powley. A chance meeting in a bar leads a vengeful law student to a road trip of retribution and spiralling violence

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: Oscar-winning crime thriller from the Coen brothers, starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin. After going on the run with $2 million from a botched desert drugs deal, hapless cowboy Llewelyn Moss is pursued across Texas by sociopathic hitman Anton Chigurh and ageing sheriff Ed Tom Bell

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Biographical crime drama starring Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe. Following the death of his mentor, Frank Lucas establishes himself as the number one distributor of heroin in the US by coming up with a unique new method of importing. But then he attracts the attention of dogged Newark detective Richie Roberts

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: John Woo's action thriller, starring John Travolta and Nicolas Cage. Terrorist Castor Troy is apprehended after an FBI operation, but in his coma-ridden state is unable to divulge the whereabouts of a bomb that is primed to blow up Los Angeles. With the clock ticking, Detective Sean Archer undertakes a face-transplant operation in order to impersonate Troy and locate the device. But things take a turn for the worse when Troy regains consciousness, steals Archer's face and assumes the lawman's identity

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: Mystery drama starring John Schneider. A seemingly straightforward missing persons case leads a private investigator into a battle against a child pornography ring holding the object of his search captive

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: A man is forced to deliver a mysterious package across London for criminals who are holding his girlfriend hostage. Action thriller, starring Josh Bowman, Neil Maskell and William Houston

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine. A runaway train loaded with toxic chemicals will derail in a populated area unless two rail company workers can put their differences aside and to try to prevent catastrophe

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: Thriller starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich and Rene Russo. Veteran Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan comes across the apartment of a man obsessed with assassination victims - especially John F Kennedy. Later he is contacted by the man, who boasts of his scheme to murder the current president and seems to have a disturbingly detailed knowledge of Horrigan's past

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Sequel to the 1987 Oscar-winning film, starring Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan. Trader Gordon Gekko is released from prison into a world vastly different from his 80s heyday when he was the most ruthless financial dealer in New York. His main priority is to forge a new relationship with estranged daughter Winnie, but an opportunity to cajole her stockbroker lover Jake into helping to bring down an old rival proves too great for the veteran wheeler dealer and reminds him that 'greed is still good'

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Detective adventure based on the classic comic strip, starring Warren Beatty, Madonna and Al Pacino. America in the 1930s, the home of heroes and villains. Bad guys like Big Boy Caprice, hunchback and underworld syndicate boss with plans for a city totally under his control. And heroes like Dick Tracy, the handsome detective with a fedora hat and a wristwatch radio, who has been close to catching Big Boy in the past, and is determined not to let him get away this time

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: A daring Canadian intelligence officer falls for a beautiful French resistance fighter during the Second World War. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of conflict. Epic Robert Zemeckis thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Marion Cotillard and Jared Harris

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine. A runaway train loaded with toxic chemicals will derail in a populated area unless two rail company workers can put their differences aside and to try to prevent catastrophe

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Following a failed assassination attempt, a soldier is stranded in the desert where he must survive the elements and stay sane enough to survive. Thriller, starring Armie Hammer, Annabelle Wallis and Tom Cullen

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Terrorists seize control of an ice-hockey stadium in the middle of a match attended by the US vice president. Taking the politician hostage, they threaten to blow up the building at the final whistle - but a resourceful former fireman takes it upon himself to thwart their dastardly plot. Action thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Powers Boothe, Raymond J Barry and Whittni Wright

programme.title: Tex
programme.desc: A teenager struggles against the odds to take care of his younger brother in the aftermath their mother's death. Drama, starring Matt Dillon, Jim Metzler, Meg Tilly, Bill McKinney, Ben Johnson and Emilio Estevez

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Comedy fantasy. The inimitable puppets are joined by Michael Caine for their own special interpretation of the classic Dickens Christmas tale, in which miserly Scrooge is visited by ghosts to help him mend his selfish ways

programme.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright

programme.title: Olaf's Frozen Adventure

Unfortunately, the therapy isn't optional and soon everyone is being scrutinised and discovering things they'd rather not know about each other

programme.title: Anything for Love
programme.desc: An executive lies about her career on her dating profile, while her suitor also hides his true identity. Romantic comedy, starring Erika Christensen and Paul Greene

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore. Wedding singer Robbie Hart is usually the master of the big occasion, but when his own bride leaves him at the altar, his life - and performances - go to pieces. Then he meets Julia, who seems to be his perfect partner, but she's already engaged and wants Robbie to organise her wedding

programme.title: Did You Hear About The Morgans?
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Hugh Grant and Sarah Jessica Parker. After witnessing a contract killing, a New York couple on the verge of divorce are forced to up sticks and move to small-town Wyoming as part of the witness protection programme

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: A woman who has rarely been without a boyfriend moves to New York following a break-up with her boyfriend. She makes a fun-loving new friend, who introduces her to the city's nightlife and teaches her to enjoy the advantages of being single. Comedy, starring Dakota Johnson, Rebel Wilson, Alison Brie and Leslie Mann

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama starring Jack Nicholson and Helen Hunt. Melvin is a bitter, bigoted writer suffering from obsessive-compulsive disorder. The staff and fellow diners at his local restaurant live in fear of Melvin's outbursts - with the exception of Carol, his regular waitress, with whom he begins an unlikely friendship. \n

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Richard Curtis, writer of Four Weddings and a Funeral and Notting Hill, makes his directorial debut with this ensemble romantic comedy featuring Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Laura Linney and Keira Knightley. In London, during the weeks leading up to Christmas, people from various walks of life suffer the emotional highs and lows of being in love. \n

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy comedy starring Tom Hanks and Daryl Hannah. A mermaid saves the young Allen Bauer from drowning and, years later, taking on human form, leaves the sea to seek him out in New York

programme.title: Christmas in the Smokies
programme.desc: A young woman battling to save her family's Smoky Mountain berry farm decides to organise a Christmas concert, calling in a favour from her country music star ex-boyfriend. Romantic drama, starring Sarah Lancaster, Barry Corbin and Alan Powell

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: Seasonal comedy starring Tim Allen and Jamie Lee Curtis. After their daughter goes to Peru to serve with the Peace Corps, Luther and Nora Krank face their first Christmas alone. Miserable at the prospect, they decide to completely forget Yuletide and go on a Caribbean cruise. But their change of plan doesn't go smoothly

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians of the Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger

programme.title: The Swan Princess: the Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Animated musical fantasy. As Derek and Odette celebrate one year of marriage, Derek's attention is distracted by the evil Clavius and his plan to steal a globe that holds magic powers

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: the Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley

programme.title: Night at the Museum 2
programme.desc: Fantasy comedy sequel starring Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Amy Adams and Hank Azaria. Larry Daley has left his job as a security guard at New York's Museum of Natural History, where the exhibits come to life after dark. But when his historical friends are put into storage at Washington's Smithsonian Institute, Larry is called in to thwart a pharaoh who wants to summon an evil army from the underworld

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Lightning Thief
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Logan Lerman, Pierce Brosnan and Sean Bean. A school trip to a museum takes an unexpected turn for teenager Percy Jackson when he is revealed to be the son of Greek god Poseidon. He is immediately plunged into a quest to retrieve a lightning bolt belonging to Zeus and prevent a divine war

programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Kevin James and Courteney Cox. While party loving cow Otis is out enjoying himself at a late-night barn dance, his father Ben is killed trying to protect the hen-house from an attack by coyotes. Reluctantly elected the farm's new leader, Otis begins to face up to his responsibilities, helped by pregnant cow Daisy

programme.title: Louis & Luca and the Snow Machine

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: Part-animated comedy starring James Marsden and Kaley Cuoco, and featuring the voice of Russell Brand. But delivering chocolate doesn't hold much fascination for the young rebel so he heads to LA to fulfil his dream of becoming a rock drummer

programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons

Meanwhile, Superman's arch-foe Lex Luthor is out of prison and plotting his next evil scheme

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure from the director of Avengers Assemble, starring Nathan Fillion. A maverick space captain and his crew of mercenaries find themselves targeted by the totalitarian Alliance when they allow a mysterious female passenger to take refuge on their spaceship

Superhero comedy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Morena Baccarin

Married scientists successfully conduct an experiment to make a human being, but joy turns to despair when their creation begins to deteriorate. However, before he can be destroyed, the 'creature' escapes from the laboratory and finds his way to Los Angeles

Student Julie James, still haunted by missing psycho-murderer Ben Willis, is invited to a weekend break on a tropical island by her room-mates, to help her forget her horrific experiences. But her nightmare is set to continue

programme.desc: Science-fiction comedy based on the popular TV series, starring Miguel Ferrer. Alf, an alien lifeform with attitude, is under surveillance at a top-secret military base. But although Alf has befriended the staff there, there are forces at work determined to see him exterminated

programme.desc: Disney sci-fi adventure, based on the Jules Verne novel, starring Kirk Douglas and James Mason. 1868: a terrifying monster is attacking ships in the Pacific, and when marine scientist Professor Aronnax sets out to investigate, he embarks on an adventure beyond his wildest dreams. In Antwerp, jewel thief Franky Four Fingers steals a huge diamond, but before he can deliver it to his New York boss he is ambushed in London by a Russian mobster's henchmen. Elsewhere in the capital, crimelord Brick Top demands that Irish boxer Mickey One Punch take a dive in an unlicensed fight. When Brick Top joins the hunt for the missing gem, mayhem ensues

programme.desc: Drama starring rap artist Eminem and Kim Basinger. Jimmy 'Rabbit' Smith is stuck in a dead-end factory job in a tough area of Detroit where he lives with his highly strung mother and little sister. Jimmy longs to break out of this bleak existence by making it as a rapper, but his road to stardom is going to be a rocky one

programme.desc: Coming-of-age drama starring Liam Walpole, Sienna Guillory and Sean Harris. It's the last day of school for Norfolk teenager Goob, but any sense of freedom and escape evaporates when he returns home to mother Janet's diner and the baleful presence of her womanising boyfriend, Gene. However, summer begins to look up for Goob when he meets a pretty young migrant who's come looking for work as a vegetable picker

But tragedy is set to strike again when a series of seemingly unrelated events around the world touch people's lives

programme.title: Stand by Me
programme.desc: Coming-of-age drama, based on a story by Stephen King, starring Wil Wheaton and River Phoenix. A writer looks back on his childhood in late-1950s Oregon, in particular the time when he and his friends set out to find the corpse of a boy believed to have been hit by a train

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Space drama based on actual events, starring Tom Hanks, Bill Paxton and Kevin Bacon. 1970: Apollo 13's mission to the Moon is hit by disaster when an oxygen tank explodes in the spacecraft. Following the initial damage report, it seems as if there is little hope of the three-man crew, led by Jim Lovell, making it back to Earth

programme.title: Hidden Figures

programme.desc: Keir Dullea stars in Stanley Kubrick's ground-breaking science-fiction epic, which depicts the evolution of man - from primitive apes to the 21st century - through the medium of space travel

programme.desc: A misfit teen from a tough California neighbourhood embarks on a perilous journey to retrieve a pair of stolen sneakers. Coming-of-age drama, starring Jahking Guillory, Christopher Jordan Wallace and Mahershala Ali

programme.desc: Western drama starring Clint Eastwood and Geraldine Page. In the American South during the final desperate days of the Civil War, a wounded Union soldier seeks refuge in a seminary for young ladies. At first it seems like a safe haven, but it soon becomes a cauldron of jealousy and sexual frustrations

programme.desc: Two lovers escape from a psychiatric hospital and head for LA, where they plan to kill Elvis Presley. Crime drama, starring Emily Browning, Luke Grimes and Ron Livingston

Shortly after riding into a Nevada town, two cowboys become unwilling members of a lynch mob hastily organised to track down the rustlers responsible for shooting a local rancher. But the mob's determination to exact swift and brutal revenge leads to tragedy

programme.desc: Satirical comedy, from the creator of Beavis and Butt-head, starring Ron Livingston and Jennifer Aniston. Downtrodden Houston computer programmer Peter Gibbons and his office colleagues endure continual hardship at the hands of patronising boss, Bill Lumbergh. Then a visit to a hypnotherapist radically changes Peter's outlook on life. \n

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama about music legend Ray Charles, starring Jamie Foxx. A poor black boy overcomes racial prejudice, blindness and drug addiction to become one of America's most revered and adored 20th-century singer-songwriters

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Coming-of-age drama starring Robin Williams. In 1959, Professor John Keating arrives to teach English at the sedate New England school where he was formerly a pupil. His extraordinary teaching methods inspire several pupils to revive the 'Dead Poets Society', a forbidden club where students secretly discuss their dreams and aspirations. But Keating's unorthodox style leads to controversy and tragedy

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: Classic spaghetti western starring Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach and Lee Van Cleef. Against a background of the American Civil War, a quiet drifter, a Mexican outlaw and a sadist search for hidden treasure

programme.title: Ray

But Keating's unorthodox style leads to controversy and tragedy
